content: I am a big animal lover and get very excited around animals. I mean only the petting ones. You won't find me excited around a lion.
I loveee to paint, draw and create beautiful stuffs from waste. If you'll ever visit me, you can find a pretty dooddle on my wall.
Who doesn't love to eat? As long as I don't gain weight. FYI - I'm hungry after every 2 hours. Please don't judge.
Gym? Everyday? No! Always motivated after every 3 months. Joins the Gym. Done with it in 2 weeks. Repeat.
Buys atleast one piece of clothing every month and still has nothing to wear.
I like to meet new people and make new friends. A cup of coffee always works :)
I want to travel the whole world and try many adventurous activities. But let's first start with exploring India.
